title: How do I turn off in-game chat filter?
body: I have disabled chat filter in the lobby, but in-game it still filters the chat for me and I can't find the option to turn it off.

replies.body:
You should be able to toggle the filter in-game through a command.  Type /chatfilter in-game, and you should get a prompt that it's been disabled.

http://i.imgur.com/K92fiCb.png

Let me know if that helps!
Found this through google and it worked for me - thanks!
